headline.main: But Is It Made With Real Gators?

lead_paragraph: WHEN PepsiCo purchased Quaker Oats last month for $13.4 billion, it might not have had Manny Ward in mind. ''I usually do water,'' Mr. Ward said, leaving the bar at Body and Soul, a weekly nonalcoholic Sunday dance party at Vinyl, a club on Hudson Street in TriBeCa. ''But I wanted something with taste.''
abstract: Article on gatorade, beverage favored by many athletes, in light of PepsiCo's purchase of Quaker Oats; drawing; photo (L)
